issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
On iOS 4.3, blur events not fired on window. Tested from KitchenSink-iPad. Otherwise, events fire on iOS 5.1.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Run KitchenSink-iPad > Split View w/Nav Group.
2. Click 'Open Window'.
3. Click 'Show Modal'.

Expected Result:

Alert indicating blur event fired.

Actual Result:

No alert, no blur event fired.
fields.summary: iOS: 4.3: KitchenSink-iPad: Split View w/Nav Group: window blur event does not fire
fields.environment:
SDK: 2.0.0.v20120328183230
Studio: 2.0.0.201203291340
OS: Snow Leopard
Devices Tested: iPad Simulator 4.3, iPad 4.3

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
